rule: The output must clearly state whether a given joke is categorized as "funny" or "not funny".
input: I have a fear of speed bumps, but I am slowly getting over it.
validityText:
The input provided is a joke. It is in text format and consists of a humorous statement that involves a pun. The joke plays on the words "slowly getting over it," which humorously refers to both physically driving over speed bumps and metaphorically overcoming a fear. According to the input specification, the joke can include any type of content such as a pun, anecdote, or any form of humor. There are no restrictions on the length of the joke, and it does not specify any content restrictions beyond the format and type (joke/humor). The input meets all the criteria outlined in the specification.

OK
